About the Company: Symphony Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of air-coolers.The company has established itself as a world leader in evaporative air coolers.The product range of the company includes Evaporative Air Coolers-Desert Coolers,Room Coolers and Personal Coolers.Air Conditioners-Window Air Conditioners and Split Air Conditioners.Water Heaters-Sauna Heaters..The company also in the business activities of Home Appliances, Corporate Funds.
